update t_therapist_treatment_time_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chu_fu_zhen = #{chuFuZhen,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, treatment_time = #{treatmentTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, day = #{day,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyid = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_therapist_treatment_time_info
order by ${orderByClause}

select.if:
SELECT vtt1.value,vtt1.text text,
IFNULL(temp.day,#{record.day}) day,
IFNULL(temp.day,DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) day,
ifnull(temp.user_id,#{record.userId}) userid,ifnull(temp.nickname,(select a.nickname from t_sys_user a where a.id=#{record.userId})) nickname, if(temp.`status`=1,1,0) status, if(CAST(vtt1.`value` AS SIGNED)<DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%H'),true,false) disabled from v_treatment_time vtt1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT vtt.text,vtt.`value`,a.day,a.user_id,tsu.nickname,a.status FROM v_treatment_time vtt INNER JOIN `t_therapist_treatment_time_info` a on a.treatment_time = vtt.`value` INNER JOIN t_sys_user tsu on a.user_id=tsu.id where a.`status`=1
and a.`day` = #{record.day}
and a.user_id = #{record.userId} ) temp on vtt1.`value` = temp.value GROUP BY vtt1.value,vtt1.text,temp.DAY order by CAST(vtt1.`value` AS SIGNED)
